Content.Text: NoMsg

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm? Well, you're a new face. ...Oh, you must
be the farmer in training who moved here just
recently!
<PAGE>
I'm <BLUE>Klaus</BLUE>. I work as a perfumer. It's very nice to
meet you.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. You look good
today, as always! And you smell to match...

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. That's quite a lot of
energy you've got for such an early hour!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Fortunately, it's quite infectious. When I look at
you, I feel peppy as well!

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
...Oh, <MYNAME>. Sorry, I stayed up late to
finish my work last night, so I'm a little...
*yawn* ...slow on the uptake right now.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm glad you're feeling so energetic and happy,
but try not to trip and fall while prancing around
like that!

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You always seem so busy! You should come
visit my house sometime. I'll mix you up a
perfume that'll put the wind back in your sails.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm? What is it, <MYNAME>? Did you need
something?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you go out late at night, be careful. This is a
safe town, but nonetheless, there can be no
darkness without danger close behind...

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you still working? This late?! You must be
exhausted, you poor thing! Please, don't push
yourself so hard. Think of your health!

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Today was quite fruitful for me... It smelled of
success! How was your day, <MYNAME>? Did
anything interesting happen?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. You came to see
me first thing in the morning? I'm flattered.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Seeing you is a
magnificent way to start the day.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning. How were your dreams, and did
they happen to include me?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now what's this? Did you come to invite me
someplace or other this evening?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Ha ha, just kidding. Of course, if you were to
invite me, I wouldn't say no...

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah, always a pleasure to see you.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
...<MYNAME>, you look exhausted. Or is it just
me? Either way, don't push yourself too hard.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Please let me know anytime you need my help.
We're more than friends now, after all.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You look like you worked hard today. You've
earned a good night's rest and a sweet dream or
two.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What are you doing this late at night? Let me
know when you want to go home. I'll walk you
there.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. Do you have time to
talk?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>...I do want to talk, and we don't always get to,
so just nod yes, please.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
God morning, <MYNAME>. I hope you had a
good night's rest.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know, there's never a dull moment when I
watch you sleep.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Ha ha, you're blushing. Are you not used to
hearing that? You're so adorable.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Good morning. Hmm, seems I'm still a bit
tired... Oh well, the day's not going to wait.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is something wrong? You didn't talk to me at all
this morning. We should always start the day off
together. It's important.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've been biding my time, waiting to talk to you
until you finished up your work. Are you free yet,
or are you still busy?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<MYNAME>, if you need help, please let me
know anytime.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I know you're busy, but would you mind taking
the time to say hello to me? I fear there's
something wrong between us.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You look a bit worn out, if you don't mind me
saying so. I made a perfume to help you relax.
Give it a try before you go to bed.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<MYNAME>, you must be tired today. Since
you've been working so hard, I'll be sure to
indulge you at home.
<PAGE>
And if there's anything you want me to do,
please don't hesitate to ask.

Content.VardId: 天気・季節ＭＳＧ（会話フラグOFFでしゃべる）

Content.Text:
<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah, I do so love this warmth!

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I don't hate rainy days, per se, but I'd rather
spend them indoors.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's hot today... Perfume is sensitive to heat and
humidity, so I have to be extra careful.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This rain should cool us off, but I can't say I
care for the humidity.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's a lovely day, isn't it? A perfect day for a
horse ride.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Walking around in the rain is a perfect way to
catch a cold. If you must go out, don't be long.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Even in this season, days like this can be hot
with enough sunlight.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Rather brisk today, isn't it? Keep yourself warm.
The last thing you need is a chill.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Best to stay indoors on a stormy day. The
outside can be very dangerous.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
It's not a good idea to go out in this heavy
snow. Luckily, I have no urgent business.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, how about this typhoon? I'd recommend
you stay indoors today.
<PAGE>
If you go outdoors, the wind might blow you
clean away. You're light enough for that, you
know.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Quite a snowstorm outside... I'm sure you have
places you'd like to go, but you really should
stay home on a day like this.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
A little bird told me you're dating someone. Best
wishes!
<PAGE>
I can't say I'm surprised, really. You're quite
popular, you know.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Despite his age, Raeger truly is a phenomenal
cook. I can only imagine he'll improve even more
with time.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I hear many restaurants these days use wall-to-
wall decorations, all color and flash. I prefer the
cozy ambiance of a place like this.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Marian's house always looks so flashy, doesn't
it? It wasn't like this before... I wonder what
changed, and when.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sorry, I'm in the middle of work right now.
Would you mind coming back later?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So many types of people here, with so many
varieties of product... It's fun just to watch them
all. The sights! The smells! Mmm...

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
With such resplendent natural beauty, there is no
better place than here for a long walk. Would
you care to join me sometime?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
To wander is only natural, but to get lost is
tragic. So do be careful! This is a mountain trail,
after all. Sheer wilderness!

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Listening to the sound of the river soothes my
soul. As a result, I come here quite often.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I recommend keeping your distance from the
river. The ground always gets slippery after it
rains. And were you to fall, oh, my!

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's nothing quite like farming at a
mountain's peak, is there?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's nothing quite like farming at a
mountain's peak, is there?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's nothing quite like farming at a
mountain's peak, is there?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's nothing quite like farming at a
mountain's peak, is there?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's nothing quite like farming at a
mountain's peak, is there?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's nothing quite like farming at a
mountain's peak, is there?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's nothing quite like farming at a
mountain's peak, is there?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Since there's a river nearby, this is the perfect
place to grow grain.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's one of those fields they have up for rent,
isn't it?
<PAGE>
Well, I do look forward to seeing what kind of
crop will grow there.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
The crops in these paddies grow extraordinarily
well. Elise is the one running this field, isn't she?
Ah, she's quite good.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Have you toured the town already? If not, I'd be
happy to escort you.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The lumber near Gunther's shop has a tendency
to topple over, so do keep your distance. I'd hate
to see you get injured.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How do you like this town? If you have any
questions, please ask me anytime.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I'm getting rusty these days, I should join a ball
game or somesuch.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Do you play any sports? We should play together
sometime. It's boring to exercise alone.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My clients often say "thank you" with snacks
and treats.
<PAGE>
But I haven't got much of a sweet tooth, so they
often sit around my house uneaten. Come to
think of it, would you care to have some?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Not everyone knows this, but Marian and I have
been friends for quite a while.
<PAGE>
Back before he lived here, I'd always keep
running into him while I was out traveling on
business. I was surprised to see him here, too.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, your clothes are wrinkled. I'm sure
your farm work is hard on your wardrobe, but
good grooming is still important.
<PAGE>
I know what a good, hardworking person you
are, but if someone who didn't know you saw
you that way, they might take you for a slob.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What? You want to know what I was like when I
was young?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>...Curiosity killed the cat. I was young and
reckless. That's all.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You're very mature for your age, you know. And
you're a good listener. In fact, once I start talking
to you, it's hard for me to stop.
<PAGE>
You're attentive and patient, just what any good
listener should be.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>And you remind me that people can always
respect one another, regardless of age
difference.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
...We shouldn't talk right now. I'm afraid I'll say
something to hurt you.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
...If you have something you wish to say to me,
say it. It's important to speak up.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
When we first met, it didn't cross my mind to
ask you out. But here we are now, and I'm glad
of it.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
No one's surprised to see us together, you know.
I thought I was being subtle with all my
advances, but maybe not...
<PAGE>
Surprisingly, it seems we're the only two people
concerned about our age difference.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Being with you has certainly given me a broader
perspective. And I've learned all kinds of new
things.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>But I'd still love to know more about you.
<PAGE>
So you can always tell me anything about
yourself. No need to be shy about it.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What do I like about you? Well, you're kind, you
do your best at everything, and...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>...and you're cute when you blush, which is all
the time.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Do you...like me? Not that I doubt you do, of
course. It's just nice to hear sometimes.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>...And now that I've asked that, my cheeks are
turning red.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_HEART1_R>You know I like you too. You're my favorite
person in the world.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
...<MYNAME>, don't you think you're taking me
for granted these days? I do have feelings, and
they can be hurt.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Apparently, your idea of marriage and mine are
completely different...

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Your feelings for me, those were more than
infatuation, weren't they?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I never knew spending time with someone could
be this relaxing...

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm a man of many skills, so if there's anything
you want me to do, ask me anytime.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Nothing would make me happier than supporting
you in any way I can.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
One of the things I love about being married to
you is that I know you even better now than
when we were dating.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Are you embarrassed? You have nothing to be
ashamed of. I love you for you, quirks and all.
<PAGE>
...Ah, you're always so cute when you blush.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
*phew* Wow... When I first saw you, I didn't
imagine I'd fall head over heels for you. But I
have.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_HEART2_R>Every day I spend with you, I find a way to love
you even more.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
...Just because we're a couple now doesn't
mean you have to be nervous about anything.
Except perhaps...making me nervous, too.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We had our time together, and here I am now,
with treasured memories and no regrets.
<PAGE>
I pray you find the right person next time.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I must say, dating you again is a dream come
true.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Our wedding day shines brightly on the horizon.
I promise you'll be as happy to be my wife as I
will to be your husband.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm lucky to have such an adorable wife. Stay
that way, won't you? I'm counting on you from
now on.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm still getting used to saying the words "our
child." Boy or girl, I wonder, and what kind...?
Rather exciting, isn't it?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you all right? You have a baby inside you
now. Remember not to push yourself too hard.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Still hard to believe our baby's almost here. It's a
first for both of us, but don't be scared.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>When the time comes, I'll be at your side. No
matter what, I'll be there for you.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
They look so innocent and adorable when they're
sleeping, don't they? And I'm their father. I'll
protect them both with my life.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Has it really been a year already since they were
born? I hope they keep growing just as they
have been.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Both of our children are so sweet and kind. But
if they keep growing at this rate...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>...<CHILD_NAME_W> will be married before we know it.
Oh, don't laugh!

Content.VardId: プレイヤーが渡した、見せたＭＳＧ

Content.Text:
<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This is...<BLUE>bouillabaisse</BLUE>, isn't it? I love this. Thank
you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You know my tastes well, I see. Thank you,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Is this for me? Thanks. Very sweet of you.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Can I have this? Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Is this for me? ...Well, I'll accept it. Thanks.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Well, it really is the thought that counts... Thank
you for the gift.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_R>Oh, you're giving me
<BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>...? I'm sorry, I can't
eat anything this spicy.
<PAGE>
I'll accept it this time, but please do keep that in
mind for next time, if you would.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
A golden crop? How intriguing. Are you sure I
can have it? Thank you.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, look how shiny... This must be rare. Are you
sure you want to give it to me? Thank you,
<MYNAME>.
Let's not give him a present for now.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is that meant for me? There's no need to be so
generous, but thank you for the thought.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Put that away, if you'd be so kind. Let's have a
talk instead, about how not to ignore your
significant other.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
...I'm not quite forgiving enough to let that
present make up for all the time you've spent
ignoring me. Please put it away.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I appreciate your thought, but since you've given
me a present already, you should save that one
for yourself.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I always appreciate a gift from you, but...
<PAGE>
I would feel guilty if I accepted too many of
them in one day. Please, save it for next time.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I've had enough gifts for one day. Your desire to
make me happy is enough for me. Thank you.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
A birthday present for me? And it's
<BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>... Thank you,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
This is the best birthday present anyone has ever
given me.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This is...<ITEMNAME0>, isn't it?
<PAGE>
A pleasant birthday surprise. Thank you,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh? A birthday present for me? Ah, I like it.
Thank you!

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm a bit too old to be excited about my own
birthday, but I do appreciate a nice, thoughtful
gift.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is...a birthday present. Really...? I see.
Thank you for thinking of me.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
...I didn't want to see this on my birthday. But
thanks.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_R>You're giving me <BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>...? Is
this some kind of prank for my birthday?
<PAGE>
I can't eat spicy food. Even as a joke, this is
going too far. Please don't do this again.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You prepared something I like for my birthday,
and then you made it shiny. Nicely done! Thank
you.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You gave me something golden for my birthday?
<PAGE>
I like it. Thank you very much.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, is that a rabbit? It's cute. I would think it
would be scared of humans, but it looks relaxed
in your arms.
<PAGE>
It must know you're a good person. Just be sure
to teach it about stranger danger.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I often find myself feeding that animal.
<PAGE>
After all, who can say no to that face?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Did you catch that animal? I know it's cute, but
you shouldn't parade it about.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ha ha, what a cuddly fellow. Are you two
friends?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What a cute penguin. It looks as if you're holding
a plushie.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
A monkey, is it? Unfortunately, I'm all out of
treats. I'll have something for you next time.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a parrot, isn't it? Where did you catch it?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So do farmers have some kind of natural animal
kinship? What's the secret to that?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This rabbit is so fluffy. Especially right on the
tips of the ears. May I pet it?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A chick, huh? So tiny. Grow big and healthy,
little one.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Aww, look at the little chicken. How's
<MYNAME> treating you, huh? Having any
trouble?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>...Oh, <MYNAME>, don't be upset. Of course I'm
joking.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, he's wagging his tail. That's adorable. Let's
take him for a walk together next time.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow, that dog is...rather rotund, I would say.
We should take him out for some exercise while
he can still move.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Small dogs are lovable, but big dogs are safer.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I don't just mean they make you safer. With a big
dog, you're much less likely to step on it by
accident.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
...Oh, I'm sorry. I know I shouldn't laugh, but
this dog is...quite well-fed, to say the least.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Don't get me wrong. He's adorable. But if he
stays that fat for too long, he might get sick.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Cats always remind me of you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Why is that, you ask? ...Well, I'll leave that to
your imagination. But I can assure you it's
entirely complimentary.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...What a round cat you are. Even cats shouldn't
sleep ALL day. You should get some exercise.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This cat's fur is so fluffy. I cannot help but pet
it.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I think this cat's a bit...overly rotund. Are you
playing with it regularly, <MYNAME>? You
shouldn't feed it too much.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, is that a present for the Flower Fair? Why,
thank you!

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah, for the Flower Fair, yes? Your gifts are
always precious to me.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah, this must be for the Flower Fair. Even now
that we're married, you're still so thoughtful.
Thank you very much.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
A Valentine's Day present, hmm? You have my
thanks.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, a Valentine's Day present? Since it's coming
from you, I'll enjoy every single bite.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah, a Valentine's Day treat from my lovely wife.
I'll savor every single bite.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
<MYNAME>, do you know what that feather is
supposed to be for? You shouldn't just wave it
about.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
A blue feather...? Hold on. These things...have
to be considered very carefully.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
...A blue feather. You're serious, aren't you? All
right, let's...go someplace quieter.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You don't have to keep showing me that. Don't
worry; I won't change my mind.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That blue feather is what got us engaged. It's
one of our most precious treasures, isn't it?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
...<MYNAME>, is it true you tried to give our
blue feather to another man?
<PAGE>
What in the world were you thinking? I don't
understand.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is that ring meant for someone in particular?
Then don't show it around. Keep it somewhere
safe.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Are you telling me you...like me?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>H-hold on! What's going on here...? Let's both
go someplace quieter.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You don't have to show me the ring. I know how
you feel.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah, that ring brought us together.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
...<MYNAME>, is it true you tried to give our
ring to another man?
<PAGE>
What in the world were you thinking? I don't
understand.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Such a pretty wrapping job. Did you wrap this
yourself? You must be...gifted at it.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Did you wrap this for me? Thank you,
<MYNAME>. Now what's inside...?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy birthday. This is not the greatest present
that's ever been given, but please accept it.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<MYNAME>, today is your birthday, yes? Happy
birthday. I hope you have a wonderful day.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Happy birthday, <MYNAME>. Your birthday calls
for a proper celebration. Please look forward to it
at home tonight.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You're always so busy. Here, please take this.
One cannot work on an empty stomach, after
all.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You look so tired today. Oh, are you simply
hungry? If that's the case, eat this and feel
better.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Please accept this, if you don't mind. I thought
you might need it.

Content.VardId: 会話間隔が空いていたＭＳＧ

Content.Text:
<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's been a long time since we've spoken. Have
you been out of town for a while?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
...Oh, <MYNAME>. You haven't been avoiding
me, have you?
<PAGE>
I suppose it's easy to misunderstand when your
significant other goes so long without talking to
you.
<PAGE>
If you are busy, please say so. You'd want the
same courtesy if you were in my shoes.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
...No matter how busy you might be, the fact
that we've gone this long without even speaking,
as a married couple, is unbelievable.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<MYNAME>, did you see that strange animal
over there?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I know you like animals, but you shouldn't
wander about with them. It stresses them out.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I'd like to stay here and relax, but the weather
here is so unpredictable, we'll have to watch for
rain.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That outfit has quite a nice color to it.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You look good in those clothes. I like the black
overalls.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I like the color of your outfit. It looks good on
you.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You look good in those clothes, too.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Not just anyone can wear jumpsuits well, least
of all myself.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What? Are you going to be a blacksmith?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Ha ha, just kidding. But that outfit certainly does
look good on you.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
A sailor uniform, is it? Not many people can
make that outfit look so stylish.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A sailor scarf, is it? You make it look good, and
that's no mean feat.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That blue in your outfit is very eye-catching. I
like it.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hmm, where'd you get that outfit, from Sakura
Country? It looks good on you in any case.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Does that outfit come from Sakura Country, by
any chance? Well, in any case, you look good in
black.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You look young in that outfit. And that's good,
because only young people can get away with
wearing it, really.
<PAGE>
You should wear it as much as you want while
you can.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Once you get to my age, it gets harder and
harder to even look at that kind of outfit. No
offense.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You look young in that outfit. And that's good,
because only young people can get away with
wearing it, really.
<PAGE>
You should wear it as much as you want while
you can.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Once you get to my age, even looking at that
kind of outfit gets harder and harder. No offense.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I like that black jacket. It looks good on you.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I like the color of your hoodie. Yellow lines on
black are very eye-catching.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>...In fact, I've heard that yellow-on-black is the
most eye-catching pattern there is.
<PAGE>
Come to think of it, I've seen it used for poles
and warning signs.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I suppose that's how your hoodie grabbed my
attention.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That down vest looks nice. Colorful and
functional, too.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That black really balances everything out... Oh,
excuse me, I was thinking out loud about your
outfit.
<PAGE>
The black vest you're wearing tones down the
brightness of the other colors and makes you
look...solid.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>If you put the black in alone, that would look
boring. But you've used just enough black in just
the right way.
<PAGE>
...And now I've probably thought more about
this than you have. Well, in any case, you have
good taste.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Why are you dressed like a doctor? And aren't
doctors' coats normally white?
<PAGE>
Well, whatever the reason is, you look good.
Convincing, too; you could pass for a real
doctor.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a very simple outfit you've got on. Very
mature of you to wear that.
<PAGE>
Not that you aren't normally mature, of course,
but you look even more so now.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Where did you get a ninja outfit?
<PAGE>
It looks good on you, but don't start believing
you can run across water or jump from tree to
tree.
<PAGE>
If you get too excited, you might hurt yourself.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Why are you dressed like a butler? Are you going
to work for some rich person? ...I see. You just
wanted to wear that, did you?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Not bad. You look very classy and authentic.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Why are you dressed like a butler? Are you going
to work for some rich person? ...I see. You just
wanted to wear that, did you?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Not bad. You look very classy and authentic.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You're wearing a very stylish hat. You should
wear that more often. It looks good on you.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That black newsboy cap looks good on you.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I like the shape and color of that hat. It's very
you.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is that a cowboy hat you're wearing?
<PAGE>
I was a cowboy in a school play once, and they
had me wear a hat just like that one.
<PAGE>
...Although I hear real cowboys don't wear them
so much.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>In any case, that hat does bring back memories.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
How do those cat ears stay on your head?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>...I see. The ears are attached to the headband,
are they? Interesting.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Are you wearing those glasses for fashion? They
look good on you.
<PAGE>
Of course, there are glasses with various colors
of frames and lenses...
<PAGE>
But those clear lenses and black frames are
perfect for you, I think.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Are you wearing those glasses for fashion? They
look good on you.
<PAGE>
Of course, there are glasses with various colors
of frames and lenses...
<PAGE>
But those clear lenses and black frames are
perfect for you, I think.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Are you wearing those glasses for fashion? They
look good on you.
<PAGE>
Of course, there are glasses with various colors
of frames and lenses...
<PAGE>
But those clear lenses and black frames are
perfect for you, I think.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...Is that you, <MYNAME>? I didn't recognize
you with those sunglasses.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>They look good on you. But they do make it
harder to see, so be careful not to trip over.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
What happened to your eye? ...Hm? You're just
wearing that for fashion? Oh. Don't startle me
like that.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Not that you don't look good as a pirate, but are
pirates popular now? I've missed something.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_PATI>
Hm... This smell is... I see. The right ingredient
is...

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I'm sorry. I have a headache today. I don't know
if I'm up for a chat...

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I seem to have caught a cold, so you may wish
to keep your distance. Would you mind stopping
by tomorrow instead?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I'm sorry... I have a terrible headache... I'd rather
just rest today, if you wouldn't mind.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hm? Are you still here? The hour's quite late,
you know.
<PAGE>
I'll be retiring to bed soon, and I suggest you do
the same.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Still awake, are you? If you stay up too late, I'll
have to put you to bed myself.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm thinking of taking a walk tomorrow morning.
Would you like me to pick up some materials for
you?
Yes, please.
No thank you.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I see. Next time, perhaps.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Very well, leave it to me. Tomorrow morning, I
will wake you when I get home.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
About those materials, you'll find <MOJI0>
<ITEMNAME0> in your backpack.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Pardon me, let me finish this meal. Then we can
talk.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, would you like to eat with me? Food does
taste better in good company.
<PAGE>
...Especially when the company is you, I must
say.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This bench looks quite comfortable. I do enjoy
that color.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah, a weathervane. Very handy for outdoor
sports, you know. Always good to know which
way the wind is blowing.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This wagon looks quite useful for transportation.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This lamp looks very stylish. In fact, I think this
lamp alone has made the town much brighter, in
its own way.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
A stone lantern, yes? You have excellent taste. A
bit different from this town's usual style, I
suppose, but not bad at all.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I do appreciate this table.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's a certain warmth to this kind of wooden
chair. Much more so than with any ordinary
chair, I would say.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
A bird fountain, hmm? Very cute, but...why a
bird, I wonder?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah, a jungle gym. I loved these as a boy.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? You want to see me play on this? Well, I
could, but...perhaps another time.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This plaza has a rare atmosphere to it. Humble in
a sense, but also dignified.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This ice lamp's appearance must vary with the
time of day. I'd say it looks best at night.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
A twinkling tree. You don't say? I do like the blue
color. Flashy, but still relaxing.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is this some kind of New Years' decoration?
Odd. I find I can't help but stare at it.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Bamboo ornaments make very pleasant sounds,
but those sounds don't always harmonize with
the ambiance around them. A shame.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How exactly does one make this kind of board?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
The Hydrangea is so beautiful. My favorite flower
by far.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Do my eyes deceive me? Actual blue roses?
Where in the world did you find them? You've
made me a very lucky man to see them like this.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
The Hydrangea is so beautiful. My favorite flower
by far.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
These potted snowdrops would be welcome in
any garden.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Do my eyes deceive me? Actual blue roses?
Where in the world did you find them? You've
made me a very lucky man to see them like this.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This is...bamboo, isn't it? I can smell it when it's
close enough. The aroma has a soothing effect.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It takes a deft hand to raise bonsai, I hear. I
might try it myself one day.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
If I were to try my hand at this, I don't think I'd
go much farther than simple tree shapes.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah, a bamboo grove. I love the scent of
bamboo. The aroma has a certain unique
texture.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Pine trees have an odd shape, but they are
amusing to look at.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This is a decoration of an alpaca, is it not? The
face is so adorable, it's...hard not to smile.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
An arch of blue flowers. I appreciate the color. It
must look outstanding, placed right at the
entrance.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I like the color of this fence.  Shiny, but not too
flashy. A fence like this would fit in anywhere.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This fence looks good in black, I must say.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
The abundance of black decorations give this
place the look of a quiet night.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
It's refreshing to come here, perhaps because of
all the blue decorations.
<PAGE>
You know, the color blue helps people relax and
improves their concentration.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This place cools me down, literally and
figuratively. I wonder why?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>...Ah, it must be because of the winter motif.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
With all the unique decorations here, this place
is never boring.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
There's mystery to this place. It almost feels as if
I'm exploring a ruin.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
The flowers here give off these waves of color.
It's so calming and soothing.

Content.VardId: 町の発展MSG　//特定住人専用会話

Content.Text:
<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
The Trade Depot is so busy now, it's hard to
believe this place was almost deserted before
you and the other farmers came.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Much bigger crowds in town these days. It
seems the trading economy here is finally
gathering steam.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Famous or not, I like this town...
<PAGE>
But because I do like it, I'd like to share the good
things about it with the world.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You've been a force for positive change since
you first came here, <MYNAME>. This town
could use more people like you.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
The Trade Depot is lonely, isn't it? I hope we can
bring in more tourism soon.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This town is an economy unto itself now. And
as a famous town's most prominent perfumer, I
find myself inundated with clients now.
<PAGE>
Now, do I take on as many orders as possible, or
do I take the time to do my best work on each
one...?

Content.VardId: 町ブラ専用MSG　//モブ専用会話
メイド、下僕用MSG　//モブ専用会話

Content.Text:
<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Do you happen to recall what day it is?
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, when you open the door to the
house tonight, something incredible may
happen.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Just remember not to stay out too late.
